TopicTitle: Where is the Tweakable Everything Thread?

Articles.Content:
title says it all although i should mention that i spent an hour searching for it to no avail so if anyone has a link to the thread(or just a copy of the mod is all i need consider spaceport is dead and its no on curse) that would be appreciated...

yes now mods lock this thread please also i probably missed it originally because i added a space....
